http.title: | Freedom Roof Project
http.html:
Freedom Roof Project

CALL NOW (855) 5MY-ROOF

  • Home
  • Review Panel
  • About
  • Past Projects
  • Terms & Conditions
  • Celebrating the Winner
About Us Celebrate The Winner

Register To Vote or Login

  • Register
  • Lost your password?

Freedom Roof Project was founded by Frances and Gary Spivey, the owners of America’s Choice Roofing in College Station, Texas. The success of America’s Choice Roofing has enabled them to give back to their community in a unique way, a free roof installation. In their quest to find families and individuals that were in need, they have built a partner base that allows them to be a bigger blessing to their community. We give credit and thanks to all our partners that help make Freedom Roof Project a success.

In the News

Check out the article on On KBTX

Testimonials

Lynn Hoffman

The peace of mind afforded to us was a great relief.  Thanks to Freedom Roof Project, America's Choice Roofing and of course, Gary and his wonderful crew.

Lynn Hoffman
Annie Williams

Thanks to the Freedom Roof Project for seeking out families in the local community who can genuinely benefit from your service.

Annie Williams
Marcia Canto

Thanks be to God for your organization who is willing to help others in need.

Marcia Canto
Janet Gooden

I am so very grateful to the Freedom Roof Project and The Spivey's for helping me.  I am so blessed to have a new roof!

Janet Gooden

Read More Testimonials »

Finally, the jumping horses go to the third station, the “Scheckenhof”, with its spacious, light-flooded indoor riding arena and the idyllically located outdoor riding arena which is surrounded by the racecourse and in close proximity to the Neustädter See. Dirk Hauser and Christina Heussler organise all the riding stables from here, and two highly renowned trainers are also employed – Paul Niemz and Thomas Mohr. At the Scheckenhof, the further career of each individual horse is also decided.   Accommodation details The stud’s own apartments, modern and practically furnished, give you affordable living space near your place of work and make it easier for you to form and strengthen social relationships even after you finish work. On request, you will be served breakfast and lunch in the stud’s own canteens.   Benefits Of course, we will help you with all the administrative issues which come up at the beginning, provide you with translating assistance and help you with anything else that you need. During that time, Caroline has built a loyal client base of both employers and jobseekers within the equestrian community, and is the first port of call for those looking to fill a vacancy, searching for a rewarding job move, or to just have a chat about the ups and downs of the unique environment of recruitment and job seeking within the world of equine careers!</strong></em></p> <p><em><strong>Caroline says “I took the decision to set up Caroline Carter Recruitment Ltd and to construct THE GROOMS LIST primarily because it was becoming increasingly clear to me that traditional equine recruitment agencies/job boards were not serving the needs of both employers and jobseekers in a way which would improve the future of our industry. I am passionate about ensuring reputable employers are put in touch with jobseekers who are hard-working professionals. Only then can things improve. Making such connections takes hard work, dedication, real instinct and years of practical experience.</strong></em></p> <p> </p> <p><em><strong>What do we do?</strong></em></p> <p><em><strong>Caroline and her team of friendly, knowledgeable, well-trained recruiters are experienced in all aspects of grooming and employment, and consequently, are able to offer sound and pragmatic advice. With unrivalled knowledge of the industry and decades of successful placements, we have now built the most cutting-edge website within equestrian recruitment. This is linked to an unrivalled social media presence, making us the place to be for employers and jobseekers alike.</strong></em></p> <p><em><strong>Contact Caroline to put your job vacancy or your job search in a safe pair of hands and for free, friendly, professional and often impartial recruitment advice.</strong></em></p> <p><em><strong>No smoke and mirrors here! Caroline Carter Recruitment aims to do things differently. Right here is the place to be if you are an employer looking to <a href="https://thegroomslist.co.uk/?s=&_noo_resume_field_reference_code=&candidate=&_candidate_phone=&_viewable%5B%5D=yes&_viewable%5B%5D=no&post_type=noo_resume">find a groom</a> or those seeking equine careers, looking for <a href="https://thegroomslist.co.uk/?_post_status%5B%5D=publish&s=&_noo_job_field_reference_code=&location=&_noo_job_field__post_code_region=&_noo_job_field__start_date_start=&_noo_job_field__start_date_end=&post_type=noo_job">jobs with horses</a>.</strong></em></p></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid"><div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12"><div class="vc_column-inner"><div class="wpb_wrapper"><div class="container-boxed max"><div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_inner vc_row-fluid"><div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6"><div class="vc_column-inner"><div class="wpb_wrapper"><section class="vc_cta3-container"> <div class="vc_general vc_cta3 vc_cta3-style-classic vc_cta3-shape-square vc_cta3-align-center vc_cta3-color-classic vc_cta3-icon-size-md vc_cta3-actions-bottom"> <div class="vc_cta3_content-container"> <div class="vc_cta3-content"> <header class="vc_cta3-content-header"> <h2>LOOKING FOR A JOB WITH HORSES? </h2> <h4>We specialise in building equine careers! </h4> </header> <p style="text-align: center;">If you seek equestrian employment, please don’t forget to add your<strong> FREE </strong>Jobseekers Profile now – apply for jobs TODAY on the industry’s <strong>fastest growing equine recruitment service! </strong></p></div><div class="vc_cta3-actions"><div class="vc_btn3-container vc_btn3-center"> <a class="vc_general vc_btn3 vc_btn3-size-md vc_btn3-shape-rounded vc_btn3-style-modern vc_btn3-icon-left vc_btn3-color-chino" href="https://thegroomslist.co.uk/member/?action=login&mode=register" title=""><i class="vc_btn3-icon fa fa-user-plus"></i> Add Jobseekers Profile</a></div></div></div></div></section></div></div></div><div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6"><div class="vc_column-inner"><div class="wpb_wrapper"><section class="vc_cta3-container"> <div class="vc_general vc_cta3 vc_cta3-style-classic vc_cta3-shape-square vc_cta3-align-center vc_cta3-color-classic vc_cta3-icon-size-md vc_cta3-actions-bottom"> <div class="vc_cta3_content-container"> <div class="vc_cta3-content"> <header class="vc_cta3-content-header"> <h2>LOOKING FOR A GROOM?</h2> <h4>Find a groom here!</h4> </header> <p align="center">If you’re looking to employ a groom, rider or any other equine staff please REGISTER today or contact us to discuss our assisted or bespoke recruitment services. With well-established recruitment expertise at your fingertips and the fastest growing equine recruitment service we are best placed to introduce you to current, relevant candidates for your job vacancy.</p></div><div class="vc_cta3-actions"><div class="vc_btn3-container vc_btn3-center"> <a class="vc_general vc_btn3 vc_btn3-size-md vc_btn3-shape-rounded vc_btn3-style-modern vc_btn3-icon-left vc_btn3-color-chino" href="https://thegroomslist.co.uk/member/" title=""><i class="vc_btn3-icon fa fa-user-plus"></i> Register Now</a></div></div></div></div></section></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_custom_1516273650783 vc_row-has-fill vc_row-o-content-middle vc_row-flex"><div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12"><div class="vc_column-inner"><div class="wpb_wrapper"><div class="container-boxed max"><div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_inner vc_row-fluid"><div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12"><div class="vc_column-inner"><div class="wpb_wrapper"> <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element noo-text-block"> <div class="wpb_wrapper"> <h2><strong>Building Equine Careers</strong></h2> <h4><strong><em>The Grooms List by Caroline Carter Recruitment Ltd in partnership with the British Grooms Association</em></strong></h4> <p><strong>Do you want to become a groom and build a career in the equestrian world but not sure how and where to start? Are you an experienced groom looking for your next career move? Are you simply looking for FREE reliable, impartial, professional equine careers advice? We are here to help you with one-to-one support and guidance throughout the entire recruitment process. From where you are today to where you want to be, we help you to identify a realistic, constructive career pathway that will help you achieve your ambitions in the equine industry. Follow our ‘<a href="https://thegroomslist.co.uk/tag/equine-careers/">Equine Careers</a>‘ series to get straight-talking advice that will help you do more, earn more and get ahead in the professional equestrian world. <a href="https://thegroomslist.co.uk/contact-caroline-carter-recruitment/">Contact us</a> for a friendly, no-obligation chat about your future employment options.</strong></p> <h4><strong>Ready to start today? All our services are completely free of charge to Jobseekers!</strong></h4></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="container-boxed max"><div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_inner vc_gitem-post-data-source-post_excerpt"><p style="text-align: left"><p>In April every year, at the end of one Tax Year and the start of the next, the National Minimum Wage and Living Wage increases. This is important for everyone in the equine industry – employers and employees alike. Equestrianism is a notoriously low-pay industry in terms of hourly salary, and salaries are frequently, if not always, topped up with extras, bonuses and tidbits. But in reality, how lawful are we in doing this without the advice and guidance of accountants and tax specialists? And what are the consequences of getting it wrong? The UK Government has strict laws regarding the minimum sum of money any individual can receive in return for work done and it can be confusing at least, a minefield at worst, when remunerating staff not just fairly, but legally too.  In this article, I asked guest blogger Kelly Wallace Horne to take a timely look, and research answers to basic questions for both employers and employees regarding the National Minimum Wage and Living Wage and to highlight common misconceptions within the equine industry regarding wages, remuneration packages and the law.</p> </p></div><div Learners are able to ‘earn while they learn’ as the tagline goes.
